table_caption: Associations between white matter parameters and demographic and clinical characteristics
table_foot: aMean axial diffusivity value for the significant voxels in the comparison between T2DM patients and lean controlsbMean white matter volume of the two significant VBM clusters in the comparison between T2DM patients and lean controls. With these values correlations with biomedical variables were calculated in all subjects (lean, obese and T2DM)
